## FolderMeta class

metadata to describe a folder for the UI

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class FolderMeta 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)({ name, files, folders, created, modified })](./opaque.foldermeta._constructor_.md) |  | create metadata for a folder |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [created](./opaque.foldermeta.created.md) |  | <code>number</code> | when the folder was created (if not created now) in <code>ms</code> |
|  [files](./opaque.foldermeta.files.md) |  | <code>FileEntryMeta[]</code> | the files included only in the most shallow part of the folder |
|  [folders](./opaque.foldermeta.folders.md) |  | <code>FolderEntryMeta[]</code> | the folders included only in the most shallow part of the folder |
|  [modified](./opaque.foldermeta.modified.md) |  | <code>number</code> | when the folder was changed (if not modified now) in <code>ms</code> |
|  [name](./opaque.foldermeta.name.md) |  | <code>string</code> | a nickname shown on the folder when accessed without adding to account metadata |
